document_data.mainbody:
The Teshpost Trail was a small roadway in the Moonsea region that connected Teshwave with the Citadel of the Raven.
The Teshpost Trail exited Teshwave on the citys north side, entering the Dragonspine Mountains near Mount Tesh where it joined the Zhentilar Trail just south of the Citadel of the Raven.
